A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''June 25, 2010''', adding [[Monster Room|dungeons]], [[saddle]]s, and [[monster spawner]]s, marking the second Seecret Friday update.<ref>[[wordofnotch:735489725|Seecret Friday update 2! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, June 25, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
{{Additions table|Monster Spawner
|Saddle}}

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Monster Spawner JE1.png|32px]] [[Monster Spawner]]'''
* Found in [[Monster Room|dungeons]].
* Spawn one of the following mobs: [[zombie]] (50%), [[skeleton]] (25%), or [[spider]] (25%).

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Saddle JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Saddle]]'''
* Can be found in [[Monster Room|dungeons]].
* Used to ride [[pig]]s.

=== Generated structures ===
'''[[File:Monster Room JE1.png|32px]] [[Monster Room|Dungeon]]'''
* The [[chest]]s may contain [[gunpowder|sulphur]], [[string]], [[wheat]], [[bread]], [[iron ingot]]s, [[bucket]]s, [[saddle]]s, and rarely [[golden apple]]s.
* [[Moss stone]] is now obtainable in normal gameplay due to it spawning in [[Monster Room|dungeons]].

== Changes ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Oak JE5.png|32px]] [[Tree]]s'''
* The appearance density has decreased.

== Technical ==
=== Player format ===
* {{nbt|byte|OnGround}} tag.
** 0 if the player is in the air, 1 if on ground.

== Bugs ==
'''5 bugs reported'''
* Map generation creates "bad chunk" areas of the map in which the player and all [[mob]]s stutter and move very slowly through.
* The [[Far Lands]] now lag and have positioning errors, allegedly different from those introduced in [[Infdev 20100624]].{{verify}}
* Being 15 blocks near previously saved [[Sign|signs]] crash the game.
* If a [[minecart]] is used by the player and the player breaks it, it crashes the game.
* The game crashes when changing window's height to 0.
